Package main

Class CollisionChecker

java.lang.Object
main.CollisionChecker
public class CollisionChecker extends Object
Handles collision detection within the game, including interactions between characters, objects, and tiles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CollisionChecker(GamePanel gp)
    Constructs a CollisionChecker object with the GamePanel.

    Specifically checks for collisions between the prisoner character and another character object.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionChecker

      public CollisionChecker(GamePanel gp)
      Constructs a CollisionChecker object with the GamePanel.
      Parameters:
      gp - - the main gamepanel of the game

  • Method Details

    • checkTile

      public void checkTile(Character character)
      Checks for collisions between a character object and tile object within the map. Adjusts the character's collision status based on detected collisions.
      Parameters:
      character - The character entity to check collisions for.

    • checkObject

      public int checkObject(Character entity, boolean prisoner)
      Checks for collisions between a character object and object object in the game. This can also detect whether the prisoner character interacts with objects.
      Parameters:
      entity - The character to check for collisions with objects.
      prisoner - Indicates if the character being checked is the prisoner.
      Returns:
      The index of the object collided with, if any; otherwise, returns a default high value.

    • checkEntity

      public int checkEntity(Character character, Character[] target)
      Checks for collisions between two character entities. used for enemy collision /interactions
      Parameters:
      character - The character initiating the collision check.
      target - An array of character entities to check collisions against.
      Returns:
      The index of the target character collided with, if any; otherwise, returns a default high value.

    • checkPrisoner

      public boolean checkPrisoner(Character character)
      Specifically checks for collisions between the prisoner character and another character object. Can be used to trigger special events or interactions.
      Parameters:
      character - The character object to check for collisions with the prisoner.
      Returns:
      True if there is a collision with the prisoner; otherwise, false.
